title: The Davis Cup, 1951
brief_description: The story of Australia’s fight to retain the world tennis premiership. The film covers the Interzone Final in Melbourne between Sweden and the USA and the Challenge Round in Sydney between the USA and Australia. Narrated by Michael Charlton and Peter Whitchurch.
